loans.name: Diyite De Piste 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Luma est le coordinateur de son groupe Diyite de piste 1, 2 & 3. Il n'est pas marié et il a 4 enfants. Luma habite dans la région nord d’Haiti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. 

Luma a dirigé son commerce pendant les dernières 15 années. Avant de commencer ce commerce, il vent des produits alimentaires et boissons gaseuse. Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à l`achat des boissons gaseuse. Des autres membres de (son de groupe) ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme le charbon et divers produits. Luma dit que son but principal est d'avoir un plus grand commerce.
texts.en:
Luma is the coordinator of the group Diyite of Piste 1, 2 & 3. He is single with four children. He lives in the northern region of Haiti, where electricity is scarce and water supplies are limited. 

Luma has been running his business for the past 15 years. Prior to this, he sold foodstuffs and carbonated beverages. He would like to use this loan to invest in his business by stocking up on carbonated beverages. 

Other group members require funding for business activities such as the sale of charcoal and various other products. 

Luma’s main goal is to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy carbonated beverages for sale.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva, está solicitándo un préstamo para poderlo invertir en la compra de mercadería para el negocio, su intención es tener surtida la tienda de aquellos productos que sus clientes le demanda a diario por ejemplo el azúcar, los frijoles, arroz, maíz, entre otros productos que son necesarios.

Manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le permitió que su negocio fuera más surtido y con mayor capacidad para atender la demanda de los clientes, su inventario se ha mantenido estable, en su familia también considera que han recibido mejores beneficios.
texts.en: Eva is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business.  She plans to stock the store with products that customers demand daily: sugar, beans, rice, corn, and other needed products.  She says that the previous loan enabled her business to be well-stocked and better able to meet customer demand, and inventory has remained stable. She feels that her family has also  received better benefits.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans, rice, and corn.

loans.name: Dioscoro

texts.en:
Dioscoro is 42 years old, married, and has three children. He and his family live in San Miguel, Bohol.  He supports his family's needs by buying coconut wine from coconut farmers, allowing it to ferment as a liquor and as vinegar. His has been in this business for 10 years. 

Dioscoro is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy more coconut wine to accommodate additional orders. In the future,  he hopes to earn a better income out of venturing unto other business opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase coconut wine.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is from San Miguel, Bohol. She is married and has three children ages 8, 10 and 15. She is engaged in selling cold snack foods, like popsicles, which have a high demand in her community. She is asking for a loan to buy ingredients in making popsicles like cassava starch, popsicle sticks and white sugar. 

Elizabeth is optimistic that with her hard work and perseverance, she can make a difference in the life of her family, especially for young children. Her profit will pay for the healthy diet of her family and will be used to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: to buy cassava starch, popsicle sticks and white sugar

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is 34 years old, married and has three children ages 4, 9 and 11. She and her husband plant and harvest rice to support their family. Her farming business earns her 2000 PHP per month.

Now requesting a loan to pay for fertilizer, quality seedlings, and labor for tilling the land, Aurelia hopes to expand the business in the future to better support her children's needs.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, quality seedlings, and labor

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina is 31 years old and a mother of 2 children ages 3 and 5. Her family lives in San Miguel, Bohol. She has been farming since having her family and this has been their source of livelihood. Like most mothers, she wants her children to have a life quite different from hers. She realized that she could do better with her farming if given financial assistance. She requested a loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides. The extra income that she can get from this will be used for her family’s daily consumption and her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of five children who are still in school. They live in Bohol, Philippines. Alma has been in a food vending business for more than five years now. This is the source of her income.

Alma is a hardworking woman who brings her best to earn a living and provide support to her husband in meeting the needs of the family. However, Alma is in need of additional capital for her business’ growth and sustainability. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients for her to cook and sell. In addition, she wants to pay the school fees of her children.

Alma hopes of seeing her business become productive. With it, she can support the schooling of her children and provide them with a good future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her to cook and sell

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina, a 34-year-old married mother of three children ages 13, 7 and 4, has been operating a tricycle transportation business for more than five years now. She is requesting a loan to pay for tricycle maintenance and fuel. This money will enable her to restore the vehicle to good working order.

Cristina hopes to make this business a success. Moreover, in the future she plans to invest in another venture to augment their income.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance and fuel for the tricycle.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en: Margarita hails from San Miguel, Bohol. She is 32 years old, married with children ages 8 months, 10 and 12. Together with her husband, they have been working hard farming rice for 5 years now to provide for their family’s needs. She wanted to increase her income for her family’s benefit. She applied for a loan to buy fertilizer, quality seedlings and pay for labor. Any additional income will go to her family’s daily consumption and her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, quality seedlings and pay for labor

loans.name: Nestor

texts.en:
Nestor has been a rice farmer for 9 years now. He is 28 years old from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. Nestor is married and had an 8-year-old daughter. His wife also helps in the farm. 

The previous harvest season was good to him, and so he is looking forward to a better income this time around. He applied for a loan to buy fertilizer, insecticides, healthy seedlings and pay for for those who will be helping in tilling the land. The additional income will go towards his family's daily consumption and savings for the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, healthy seedlings and pay for labor

loans.name: Deceluna

texts.en:
Deceluna is 50 years old and married. She runs a sari-sari or convenience store, which she has been doing for more than 20 years. She works hard to earn a living for her family. 

Deceluna is in need of additional capital for her business and is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy additional stocks to sell in her store such as canned goods, sodas, bread, and other snack foods.  With the increased stock, she will be able to cater to more customers.

Deceluna hopes to expand her business and make it sustainable so that it will generate more revenue necessary for her family’s needs and expenses.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, sodas, bread, and other snack foods.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is into farming to support her family. She is married with six children. Her eldest is 18 while the youngest is 3. She and her family live in San Miguel, Bohol. This is a town three hours away from Bohol's capital, Tagbilaran City. 

She is engaged in growing rice for an income. She applied for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farm and pay for tuition fees. They are expecting a better yield on their crops for having the means now to pay for the needed farming maintenance. Any income derived from this business will be spent on her family’s daily consumption, school fees and future business investment.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.en:
Eleuteria is a 45-year-old married woman from the town of Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. She has been engaged in a clay pottery business for years. This is the source of her income. Her husband works as a carpenter. Eleuteria also raises pigs in her backyard to sell at the market. 

As of this time, Eleuteria is requesting a loan worth 8,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy piglets and materials to make clay pots. Eleuteria hopes to have a successful business in the future.

loans.use: to buy piglets and materials to make clay pots.

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  La socia María Esther tiene  53 años de edad ,08 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artículos de camping, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio cada día ,la socia tiene un local donde vende su mercadería por el centro de la ciudad, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de carpas para su negocio.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: The member, María Esther, belongs to the ”Maria Elena Moyano“ Communal Bank.  She is 53 years old and married with eight children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling camping equipment.  The member has been in this business for years and it is going well thanks to the great deal of effort that she puts into the business each day.  She has a location in the center of the city where she sells her merchandise.  She is a responsible and persevering person and by being this way, she gets her family ahead. She is requesting the loan to purchase tents for her business.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tents for her buisness.

loans.name: Hector Federico

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  El socio Hector tiene  45 años de edad ,05 hijos y es casado,el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de autopartes de carros ,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,el socio tiene su local ubicado por el centro de la ciudad, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de esta manera que el socio poya a su familia economicamente .

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de repuestos como aceite de carros y faros para su negocio.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The borrow is part of the communal bank  ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO." The borrower Hector is 45 years old, has 5 children and is married. He balances his daily activites with his business of selling car parts. He has been working in this business for many years and it is going well for him thanks to his daily perseverence with this business. His shop is located in the centre of the city. He is a responsible and determined man, and in this way he is able to support his family financially. 

The borrower is asking for a loan to buy spare parts and supplies such as car oil and headlamps for his business. He is happy with the loan and promises to make the repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and supplies such as car oil and headlamps for his business.

loans.name: Yanett Dionisia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  La socia Yanett Dionisia tiene 58 años de edad ,03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de joyas y ropa, la socia vende la mercadería de forma independiente a sus clientes que le solicitan como familiares y amistades, este negocio lo hace cada cierto tiempo ya que la socia es enfermera de profesión y trabaja en uno de los hospitales de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.


La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: The member, Yanett Dionisia belongs to the “Maria Elena Moyano” Communal Bank.  She is 58 years old, and married with three children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling jewelry and clothing.  She sells her merchandise independently to customers, such as family and friends, on request.  She works on this business every so often because she is a nurse and works in one of the hospitals in Cusco.  She is a responsible and persevering person and by being this way, she gets her family ahead.  She is requesting this loan to pay for her children’s studies.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for her children's studies.

loans.name: Felix Ivan

texts.es:
Felix Ivan tiene 26 años de estado civil Union Libre vive con la compañera y con un hijo. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

Felix Ivan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, arroz. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. El sueño es comprar más terreno.

En el tiepo libre le gusta leer la biblia.
texts.en: Felix Ivan is 26 years old.  He is in a common-law relationship and lives with his companion and son.  He lives in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos province.  The “14 de Diciembre” Communal Bank is comprised of fifteen members of the San José cooperative, located in the “San Vicente de Las Lomas” precinct belonging to the Ventanas Canton.  The inhabitants are engaged in agricultural activities such as planting corn.  Felix Ivan is engaged in agriculture and plants corn and rice.  He buys and sells his products in Ventanas.  He is requesting the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, and liquid fertilizer to plant corn.  The loan will help him increase the family income.  His dream is to buy more land.  In his free time, he enjoys reading the Bible.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, and liquid fertilizer to plant corn.

loans.name: Bertha Urbelinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  La socia Bertha  tiene  65 años de edad ,03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de manualidades ,la socia elabora diferentes tipos de trabajos como cojines ,la socia trabaja de forma independiente y a pedido, ella vende a sus amistades y familiares que le solicitan, la socia a la vez es profesora cesante del magisterio, siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante y puede seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como telas, hilos entre otros.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Bertha belongs to the “Maria Elena Moyano” Communal Bank. She is 65 years old, married, and has 3 children. Bertha's daily activities include a business making handicrafts. She fashions different types of products including cushions. Working independently and by requests, Bertha sells to her friends and family members who order her crafts. She is also a retired school teacher. This is how she gets ahead and is able to continue helping her family.

Bertha is requesting a loan to buy materials for her business, such as cloth and thread, among other items. She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business such as cloth and thread, among other items.

loans.name: Digna Fidela

texts.es:
DIGNA tiene 38 años de edad es casada tiene tres hijos,  vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos
	
Es integrante de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Digna se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz

Digna se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz, las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar abonos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza, Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar insumos para los cultivos sin ninguna dificultad. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas el raton y la langosta en los sembríos.

El sueño es poder comprar un terreno para poder sembrar y hacer una casa.  En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar los quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Digna is 38 years old and is married with three children. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. She is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank supports the work of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas. 

Digna is a farmer who grows corn and rice. She buys her supplies and sells her products in Ventanas. 

Digna is requesting this loan to buy manure, fertilizers, urea, and weed killers. With the help of this loan, she will be able to purchase the inputs necessary for cultivation without any difficulties. She faces challenges such as plagues, mice, and locusts in the crops.

Her dream is to be able to purchase terrain that she can harvest and on which she can build a house. In her free time, she likes to do housework.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, urea and weed killers.

loans.name: Joaquin

texts.en:
Joaquin, 56, is from the community of San Miguel, Bohol. He earns a living through rice farming. He is married and depends on his crops for an income. His business started 30 years ago, and he would like to sustain and improve his harvest. 

He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, quality seeds and a sprayer. From this loan, he expects a good harvest and an increase in business profitability. The additional income will go to his family's daily consumption and possible new business opportunities.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, quality seeds and a sprayer

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a resident in Bohol, Philippines. She is in the fishing business, since her husband is a fisherman. They have done this for more than four years now. 

Jocelyn is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets and to repair and maintain the fishing boat. With this, her husband will be able to enhance his catch, thus giving them more of a chance to augment their income. 

Jocelyn is optimistic that she will be able to improve their way of living and enjoy a full life. Moreover, she wants to save for the future schooling of her young children.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and to repair and maintain the fishing boat.

loans.name: Felix Alfredo

texts.es:
FELIX  tiene 37 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Felix se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, líquidos, ure y fertilizantes para el maíz. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar los productos sin ningún problema y sin falta de dinero. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas la langoista en los cultivos.

El sueño es poder comprar terreno para cultivar cacao y comprarse una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte .
texts.en:
Felix is 37 years old and married with two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the Cantón Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of the communal bank "October 27th," which is located in the Santa Sofía neighborhood, part of Cantón Ventanas.  This group works in agriculture, planting crops with short growing seasons: corn, rice, and beans.

Felix works in agriculture, planting corn, and he makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas.

He is requesting this loan to purchase compost, liquid nutrients, urea, and fertilizers for the corn.  With the support of the loan, he will be able to purchase the products with no problem and won't be short of money.  The challenges that he faces are diseases in the crops.

His dream is to be able to purchase land to cultivate cocoa and to buy a house.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy compost, liquid nutrients, urea, and fertilizers for his corn crop.

loans.name: Elias Francisco

texts.es:
Elias Francisco tiene 29 años de estado civil Soltero vive el papà, no tiene hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

Elias Francisco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, arroz y fréjol galdúl. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El crédito solicita para la compra de semillas de maíz, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. El sueño es comprar un carro.

En los tiempos libres le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
Elias Francisco is 29 years old.  He is single, lives with his father and has no children.  He lives in Ventanas Canton, de Los Ríos Province.

The communal bank, "14 De Diciembre" (14th of December) is made up of 15 members of the San José Cooperative.  It is located in San Vicente de las Lomas Precinct, which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  The members make their livings in agricultural labors, like planting corn. 

Elias Francisco makes his living in agriculture.  He plants corn, rice and pigeon peas.  He purchases his supplies  and sells his products in Ventanas. 

Elias Francisco is requesting the loan to purchase corn seed, compost, urea and liquid fertilizers.  The loan will him to increase his family's income.  His dream is to buy a car. 

In his free time, Elias Francisco likes to play indoor soccer.

loans.use: with the purchase of corn seed, compost, urea and liquid fertilizer.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana runs a sari-sari (or convenience store) at her place in Bohol, Philippines. She is also engaged in a fishing business.

Luciana needs more funds for the expansion of her business. She is applying for a loan worth 6,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy more items to sell in her store and to buy new fishing nets for her husband’s fishing venture. Through this loan, she can increase her stock to sell in her store and increase the catch of her husband when he goes to fishing.

In the future, Luciana hopes to make her business a great success so that it will generate more revenue, which is necessary for their needs. Any additional income will be used for reinvestment in the same businesses and for savings.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store and to buy new fishing nets for her husband’s fishing venture.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is a 47-year-old, married woman from Bohol, Philippines.  She has run a sari-sari, or mini-grocery, store from her place for more than 20 years.
 
Felicitas needs funds to expand her business.  She is applying for a loan to buy additional items to sell in her store, such as dry goods and snack foods. 

Felicitas hopes to make her business a great success so that it will provide her with the income necessary to pay for her family's needs and her children's education.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julita is a merchant and has run a sari-sari, or convenience store, in Bohol, Philippines, for years now. This is the source of her income. Julita works hard to help her husband in meeting the needs of the family.

Julita is applying for a loan of 27,000 PHP to buy additional merchandise to sell in her store, such as soda, dry goods, canned goods, etc.

In the future, Julita hopes to expand her current business and invest in other ventures to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise to sell in her store, such as soda, dry goods, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is a 60-year-old married woman and the mother of ten grown children from Bohol, Philippines. She has run a tricycle transport business for about 20 years. This is the source of their income.

Linda is in need of additional capital for the business. She is asking for a loan to buy spare parts and to repair the tricycle. Through it, the good working condition of the vehicle will be revived. 

Linda hopes to make the business successful, so that it will continue to support the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to repair the tricycle

loans.name: Louelyn

texts.en:
Louelyn is a food vendor from Bohol, Philippines. She sells a variety of snack foods to the people in their locality. This business provides her with the income she needs.

Louelyn joined CEVI to use the financial and insurance services offered by the organization. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional materials and ingredients for her food vending business. With this, she will be able to cook and increase the number of products she sells.

In the future, Louelyn dreams of expanding her business so that it will generate more income.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Remegio

texts.en: Remegio is a 54-year-old man and a father of five children from Bohol, Philippines. For more than 30 years, he has been in the fishing business. Remegio is a hardworking fisherman willing to give his best to earn a living. As of this time, Remegio is in need of additional capital for his fishing business. He is applying for a loan for the repair and maintenance of his fishing boat. He also plans to buy new fishing nets since the one that he is currently using is already worn out. With this, he will be able to enhance his catch, thus augmenting his sales and income. In the future, Remegio dreams of expanding his business and making it a success.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his fishing boat

loans.name: Erica Jharly

texts.es:
Erica Jharly tiene 19 años de edad de estado civil actual unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el compañero y el hijo en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC DIVINO NIÑO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Cachely grande, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Erica Jharly se dedica a la Agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol. Las compras y las ventas de los productos lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, líquido para plagas, insumos. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá sembrar maíz, Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas el cogollero y la langosta.

 El sueño es tener una mejor calidad de vida aumentando los ingresos económicos. En el tiempo libre le gusta criar animales y pasar con el hijo.
texts.en:
Erica Jharly is 19 years old and in a civil partnership.  She has one child, and lives with her partner and child in Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

She is a member of the VRC Divino Nino community bank, which is located in the Cachely Grande district of Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, and pigeon pea beans.

Erica Jharly works in agriculture growing corn and beans.  She makes her purchases and sells her products in Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, pest control liquid, and supplies.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to grow corn.  She faces challenges such as infestations of budworm and locusts.

Her dream is to have a better quality of life by increasing her income.  In her free time she likes to raise animals and go for walks with her child.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, pest control liquid and supplies.

loans.name: Pablo Israel

texts.es:
PABLO ES SOLTERO NO TIENE HIJOS VIVE CON LOS PADRES EN LA CUIDAD DE CHIMBO.

PABLO ES MECANICO AUTOMOTRIZ EL DINERO SOLICITA PARA LA COMPRAR DE BIENES PARA EL HOGAR DE LOS PADRES Y PARA EL ESTUDIO. EL CREDITO LE AYUDADO PARA COMPRAR LAS SCOSAS QUE LE HACEN FALTA EN EFECTIVO.

PABLO SUEÑA CON TENER UN TRABAJO Y PODER EJERCER LA PROFESION. 

EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES SE DEDICA A PASAR CON LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Pablo is a single man with no children. He lives with his parents in the city of Chimbo.  

Pablo is an auto mechanic. He requested the loan to buy household goods for his parents and also for his studies. The loan has helped him buy the things that he needed. 

Pablo dreams of having a job and to be able to practice his profession.  

He spends his spare time with his family.

loans.use: to buy household goods

loans.name: Pilar

texts.en:
Pilar is a 62-year-old, married woman and the mother of 11 grownup children.  She is from Bohol, Philippines.  She has been in the hog raising and farming business for several years now.  This is the source of her family's income.

Pilar works hard to earn a living and support the needs of her family.  As of this time, she is in need of additional funding for her business.  Pilar is requesting a loan from CEVI to buy fertilizers for her farm and feed for her pigs.

In the future, Pilar hopes to make her venture a successful one.  Moreover, she wants to continue reinvesting in her business and save for the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and feed for her pig farm.

loans.name: Romana

texts.en: Romana is a 64-year-old married woman and mother of seven grown children from Bohol, Philippines. For several years, she has been engaged in a hog-raising business. Romana is in need of additional capital for her business. She is requesting a loan to buy additional piglets and feed. With this, she will be able to grow healthy pigs. Romana hopes to improve her business in the future so that it will generate more income. Moreover, Romana wants to reinvest in this lucrative business and save some money for future use.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed

loans.name: Rosalino

texts.en: Rosalino is 34-year-old merchant who runs a sari-sari or convenience store in Bohol, Philippines. He has operated this store for more than three years now. As of this moment, Rosalino is in need of additional capital for his business. He is requesting a loan to buy additional merchandise to sell in his store such as dry goods, canned goods, soda, and snack foods. With more inventory, he will be able to attract more buyers in his community. In the future, Rosalino hopes to improve his business and his standard of living. Moreover, he wants to save for the schooling of his two young children.

loans.use: buy additional merchandise such as dry goods, canned goods, soda, and snack foods

loans.name: Flor Idalia

texts.es: Flor Idalia, tiene 27 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, vive con su esposo e hijos en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella tiene su propio negocio de confección de ropa interior para damas. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa desde hace 5 años y la producción la vende en el mercado local. Para mejorar su producción solicita un préstamo por 21,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar materia prima para confeccionar la ropa interior, como ser: telas, hilos, elásticos, encajes y otros. Con esta inversión va incrementar la producción y las ventas. tiene como meta trabajar duro para que sus hijos se gradúen y tambien poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Flor Idalia, 27, has two children.  She lives with her husband and children in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  She has her own women’s underwear making business.  She’s had it at home for the last five years and she sells what she produces in the local market.  To improve production she’s asking for a 21,000 Lempira loan to buy raw materials such as fabric, thread, elastic, lace and others to make the underwear.  She will be able to increase production and sales with this investment.  Her goal is to work hard so that her children will graduate and also to be able to make some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies to make underwear.

loans.name: Virgilio Randolfo

texts.es: Virgilio, tiene 36 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su madre en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Virgilio siempre quiso tener su propio negocio, y decidió hace 6 años dedicarse a la venta de productos de belleza, cosméticos, cremas, lociones y perfumes. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante a domicilio y por pedidos mediante catalogo, también vende en su casa. el préstamo que solicita es el séptimo y es por 13,000 Lempiras, con el cual va surtir de productos variados para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. El préstamo le ayudara a comprar de contado lo que le permite obtener mejores ganancias. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio para obtener más ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Virgilio, 36, is single living with his mother in Tela, Atlántida.  Virgilio always wanted a business of his own and decided six years ago to start selling beauty products, cosmetics, creams, lotions and perfumes.  He sells from house to house and also via catalogue orders; he also sells at home.  The loan he’s requesting is for 13,000 Lempiras that he’ll use to stock up on assorted products to meet customer demand.  The loan will help him pay cash which means higher profits.  His goal is to make the business grow to obtain more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Tomasa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Tomasa, ha decidido iniciar sus cultivos de maíz y pipián, para esto solicita un nuevo préstamo que le permite comprarse los materiales agrícolas y así tambien invertir una parte en una tienda de productos domésticos, en su inversión estará el abono, herbicidas, gaseosas, boquitas, y otros productos que son necesarias, su intención es continuar trabajando y a través de los préstamos realizar el trabajo agrícola y la inversión en el negocio.

Con el préstamo anterior logró tener un efecto positivo ya que sus cultivos le produjeron una mejor cosecha, en este período también ha iniciado la tienda de productos no perecederos que es un avance para la economía de su familia, considera que está mejorando su condición económica y por lo mismo desea continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
Tomasa has decided to start planting corn and pumpkin and is asking for a new loan to buy farm supplies.  She will also invest part of the loan in a grocery store.  She will buy manure, herbicide, soft-drinks, packaged snacks and other products needed.  Her intention is to continue working and by means of loans do the agricultural work and invest in the store.

She got positive results from the previous loan because her crops produced higher yields and during this time period she opened the grocery store which represents an economic step forward for her family.  She feels that her economic situation is improving which is why she wants to continue to work.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies, soft-drinks and packaged snacks.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, porque considera necesaria una nueva inversion en la carnicería, se comprara carne de res, de cerdo, y también chorizos, ya que esto le permite mantenerse con los clientes ofreciéndole calidad de carnes de diferentes especies.

Gracias al préstamo anterior y ha logrado mantener el negocio y al mismo tiempo le ha permitido ganarse nuevos clientes, esté préstamo a través de kiva le ha aumentado la capacidad de inversión y estabilizado su situación económica en la familia.
texts.en:
María has decided to get a new loan because she believes a new investment in the butcher shop is necessary.  She will buy pork, beef and sausages in order to stay in business offering her customers various kinds of meat.

Thanks to the previous loan she’s managed to stay in business while at the same time winning over new customers.  This Kiva loan has increased her investment capacity and stabilized her family’s economic situation.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork and sausages.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.en: 49-year-old Jacinto is managing a farm in San Miguel, Bohol. Along with his wife, he grows rice for an income. He has a son who is 23 years old who also helps him. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and quality seeds, and to pay the labor fees for hired help. Jacinto knows that his hard work will pay off and will help in uplifting his present living condition. In the future, he hopes to retire with a bigger savings and a comfortable life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and quality seeds, and to pay labor fees

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She and her family live in Bohol, Philippines. For more than three years, Victoria has run a sari-sari or convenience store. She sells household goods and snack foods to the people in her community. As of now, Victoria is in need of additional funds for her store. She is requesting a loan to buy items such as rice, canned goods, noodles, soda, etc. With this, she will be able to enhance her sales and profits, as she will have enough inventory to sell. Victoria dreams of making her store a success.

loans.use: to buy items such as rice, canned goods, noodles, and soda to sell in her store

loans.name: Zulpiya

texts.ru: Зулпие 55 лет, вдова, воспитала 4 детей.  Зулпия в качестве источника дохода для семьи занимается откормом и разведением скота уже в течение 20 лет.  Начатое практически с нуля хозяйство  благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду Зулпии насчитывает на сегодня  6 голов крупного рогатого скота, 0,83 га земли с кукурузой  и приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зулпия обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы для увеличения надоев. Доходы Зулпия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства, чтобы оплатить контракт на обучение младшей дочери.
texts.en: Zulpiya is 55 years old, a widow and raised four children.  To provide a source of income for her family, she has been involved in fattening up and breeding livestock for 20 years.  The business, started practically from zero, today, thanks to Zulpiya's persistence and hard work, contains six cattle and 0.83 hectares of land with corn, and yields about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from sale of milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Zulpiya requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a dairy cow in order to increase milk volumes.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued business growth, so that she could pay for her youngest daughter's education contract.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to increase milk volumes

loans.name: Jamalbubu

texts.ru: Жамалбубу 65 лет, мать 8 детей.  Жамалбубу в качестве основного источника дохода для семьи с 1979 года занимается откормом и разведением скота.  Начатое практически с нуля хозяйство  благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду Жамалбубу насчитывает на сегодня  4 головы крупного рогатого скота, 20 голов мелкого, 2 лошади  и приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. Доходы от деятельности позволили Жамалбубу дать образование своим детям, которые устроили свою жизнь и живут отдельно. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жамалбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы Жамалбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства, и в этом году помочь младшему сыну в постройке дома для его семьи.
texts.en: Jamalbubu is 65 years old and a mother of eight children.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, she has been involved in fattening up and breeding livestock since 1979.  The business, started practically from zero, today, thanks to Jamalbubu's persistence and hard work, contains four cattle, twenty small livestock and two horses, and yields about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sale of milk products.  The earnings from the business allowed her to provide education for her children, who set up their lives and now live separately.  In order to further develop her business, Jamalbubu requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sheep for fattening up and resale.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued business growth and wants to help her youngest son to build a house this year.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Khayrullo

texts.ru: Хайрулло проживает в районе Кумсангир. Он родился 1962 году. Хайрулло женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Хайрулло занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт. Хайрулло просит кредит для посева лука.
texts.en: Khayrullo lives in the Qumsangir district.  He was born in 1962.  Khayrullo is married, and his wife is a homemaker.  He is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  He has a rich experience in this field.  Khayrullo is requesting this loan to sow onions.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel to sow onions

loans.name: Santa Elena Group

texts.es:
El comité Santa Elena cuenta con 11 integrantes que se dedican a actividades comerciales variados desde la venta de comestibles hasta venta de flores. Las señoras del comité se caracterizan por ser unidas, solidarias y sobre todo emprendedoras ya que todas necesitan aumentar sus ingresos para contribuir con la  manutención de sus familias.
La señora Ovilia se dedica a la actividad de la cerámica, ella gracias a su imaginación y talento ha podido salir adelante.
Solicita el crédito para poder mantener su taller y también para comprar los productos necesarios como por ejemplo pinturas y pinceles.
texts.en:
The “Santa Elena” committee has 11 members that are in a variety of commercial activities ranging from the sale of food to the sale of flowers.  The women in the committee are noted for being united, mutually supportive and above all for being enterprising since they all need to increase their income to contribute to their families’ support.

Ovilia works with ceramics and thanks to her imagination and talent has been able to get ahead.  She requests the loan to maintain her workshop and also to buy products needed like paint and brushes, for example.

loans.use: to buy paint, brushes, etc.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en: Letecia is 48 years old and lives in Talibon, Bohol. She is married and has four children. Her eldest is 24, and the youngest is 18. Letecia operates a sari-sari store (general store) in her neighborhood. She sells basic household items like canned goods, chips, seasoning, and toiletries. She is asking for a loan to buy in bulk merchandise such as noodles, eggs, seasoning, toiletries, soft drinks, and rice. She is optimistic that with dedication and store renovations, her customers will be more attracted to her store. In the future, she would like to make her store bigger and sell items that she does not currently carry. Any additional income she earns is used for meeting her family's daily needs, savings, and school fees.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as noodles, eggs, seasoning, toiletries, soft drinks, and rice

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
El comité San Juan esta compuesto por 16 integrantes mujeres dedicadas a actividades varias pero la mayoría se dedica a la venta de productos ya sean comestibles, ropas, productos de limpieza, etc.El comité siempre se caracterizo por el espíritu emprendedor de las integrantes.
Una de las integrantes, la señora Olinda se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza para el hogar, con esta actividad ella ayuda a su canasta alimnenticia familiar.
La señora desea obtener el crédito para poder comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderías como desodorante de ambiente, trapos, escobas, limpia muebles, limpia vidrios, etc. para abastecer la demanda constante que tiene y de esa forma poder generar mayor ingreso.
texts.en:
The “San Juan” committee has 16 members who are all women dedicated to various activities but most of them work selling products like food, clothes, cleaning supplies, etc.  The committee has always stood out for the enterprising spirit of its members.  One of them is Olinda who sells home cleaning supplies.  She’s able to help her family cover basic food needs with this activity.

She wants to get a loan to be able to buy larger amounts of merchandise like room fresheners, rags, brooms, furniture cleaners, window cleaners, etc. to stock up and meet the constant demand she has and be able that way to generate higher income.

loans.use: to buy cleaning supplies.

loans.name: Justino

texts.es:
Don Justino tiene 44 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad.
Con su esposa tiene un negocio de venta de sobrecamas, hamacas que la realizan de forma artesanal es decir a mano ya que tienen una tejedora. Sus mercaderías son muy lindas y de buena calidad por ello salen a vender a otras ciudades a un precio mas elevado que de igual forma tiene una muy buena aceptación.
El crédito lo solicita para poder continuar en el negocio con un precio accesible y de calidad para ello necesita los materiales como hilos simples y los de color, sábanas, agujas,etc.
texts.en: Justino, 44, is married and has two adult children.  He and his wife have a bedspreads and hammock business that they manufacture in an artisanal way, that is by hand; they have a loom.  Their merchandise is very beautiful and high quality so they go out to sell them in other cities at a higher price; they are very well-received.  He requests the loan to be able to stay in business offering affordable prices and quality.  To do so he needs materials like simple and colored thread, sheets, needles, etc.

loans.use: to buy thread, sheets, needles, etc.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”MARIA ELENA MOYANO“;  La socia Larisa tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en un colegio de una las provincias de Cusco ejerciendo su carrera de docente, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante y espera poder seguir trabajando.


La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su hogar.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the ”Maria Elena Moyano" communal bank. The borrower Larisa is 30 years old, and is in a common-law relationship. 

She alternates her daily activities with working in a school in one of the provinces of Cusco, practicing her occupation as a teacher. She has been doing this work for some time, and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. Larisa is a responsible and hard-working person; as this is how she is moving forward in life, and she hopes to be able to keep working. 

The borrower is requesting the loan so that she can buy basic household products for her home. 

She is happy about the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy basic household products for her home.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru: Людмила замужем. Она имеет свой бизнес. Людмила торгует на привокзальном рынке. Она имеет свой торговый киоск, в котором продает печеньее и конфеты. Людмила трудолюбива и ответственна. Она имеет большой опыт работы и много постоянных клиентов. Людмила просит предоставить ей кредит для того, чтобы закупить дополнительный товар и рассширить ассортимент.
texts.en: Ludmila is married.  She has her own business and sells at a market by a train station.  She owns her retail kiosk, where she sells cookies and candy.  Ludmila is hardworking and responsible.  She has an extensive work experience and many regular customers.  Ludmila is requesting this loan to purchase additional merchandise and expand her selection.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise and expand her selection

loans.name: Zemma

texts.en:
Zemma runs a sari-sari or convenience store in Bohol, Philippines. She is a hard-working woman willing to give her best to earn a living. 

At this time, Zemma lacks funds for her business. She joined CEVI in order to gain access to the financial services offered by the organization. 

Zemma is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy more items to sell in her store such as canned goods, soda, rice, and snack foods. With this merchandise, she will be able to cater to her customers.  Zemma hopes oto improve her business so that it will generate more income for her family’s sustenance.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, soda, rice, and snack foods.

loans.name: Edmundo

texts.en: Edmundo is 49 years old and from Talibon, Bohol. For 20 years, he has been a fisherman. He is married and has four children (ages  8, 12, 15 and 19). Through his fishing business he faithfully supports his family's needs. Edmundo also catches crabs in Talibon. He is asking for a loan to buy fishing net and crab traps to earn a better income. He is working hard so his children can go to school and can eat a nutritious diet. In the future, he hopes to have other business options to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and crab traps

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
Sergia is a rice farmer from Bohol, Philippines. She tills her land together with her family. Sergia works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family.

Sergia needs additional funds for her farming ventures. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy seedlings and fertilizers and to maintain the equipment used in the field. With this loan, she will be able to grow and produce healthy crops thus increasing her yield and profit.

Sergia dreams of making her business a success in the future so that she could raise their living standard and experience the fullness of life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizers and to maintain the equipment used in the field.

loans.name: Rosa Yasmin

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo pues considera necesaria la inversión en el negocio comprándose nuevos cerdos pequeños, para iniciar el proceso de engordarlos para luego comercializarlos, este préstamo le permitirá mejorar su condición en el negocio.

Con el préstamo anterior manifiesta que logró realizar una buena venta de los cerdos, ha logrado atender un buen número de clientes y sus condiciones económicas considera que están cambiando, siendo más favorables en la actualidad todo esto lo ha conseguido a través del financiamiento de prestamos.
texts.en:
Rosa has made up her mind to take out a new loan, as she considers it necessary to invest in her business by buying new small pigs, in order to begin the process of fattening them for later sale. This loan will allow her to improve her business circumstances. 

With the previous loan, she says that she managed to carry out a successful sale of pigs, and has been able to serve a good number of customers. She considers that her financial circumstances are changing, and are more favorable now. She has achieved all this through the loan financing.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru: Галина замужем, есть один взрослый сын. Галина торгует на выездных рынках женской обувью и одеждой.  Опыт ее  работы - 17 лет. Галина инициативная и ответственная. Она планирует развивать свой бизнес дальше, чтобы получить дополнительную прибыль и улучшить быт свой семьи. Галина просит предоставть ей кредит, чтобы закупить сезонный товар.
texts.en: Galina is married and has one adult son.  She sells women's shoes and clothing at traveling markets.  She has 17 years of work experience.  Galina is responsible and shows initiative.  She plans to develop her business further in order to make an additional profit and improve her family's welfare.  Galina is requesting this loan to purchase seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise for the fall season

loans.name: Dieu D'israel 2, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
Emmanuel est le coordinateur de son groupe Dieu D'Israel. Il est marié et il a 3 enfants. Emmanuel habite dans la région Ferrier Nord’est d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Il a dirigé son commerce pendant les 8 dernières années. 

Emmanuel voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à vendre le commerce du cosmetique. Des autres membres de Dieu D'Israel ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme charbon et produits divers. Emmanuel dit que son défi principal est devenir un grand commercant et son but principal son rêve est aider votre famille à faire face.
texts.en:
Emmanuel is the coordinator of the group Dieu d’Israel. He is married with three children. He lives in the Ferrier region, northeast of Haiti, where electricity is scarce and water supplies are limited. 

Emmanuel will use this loan to invest in his cosmetics business, which he has been running for the past 8 years. 

The other group members require funding for business activities such as the sale of charcoal and various other products. 

Emmanuel’s main ambition is to become an important businessman, and his primary goal is to support his family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Renny

texts.en:
Renny is 26 years old, married and has two children, a 2-year-old and a 1-month-old baby. He is a very hardworking man, selling homemade ice cream and driving a motorcycle (called habal-habal services) for an income. He and his family live in San Miguel, Bohol.
  
He is asking for a loan to buy ice cream cones, sugar, milk and spare parts for motorcycle. The profit from his livelihood will be for his family's healthy diet and to reinvestment in the same businesses. In the future, Renny hopes to improve his livelihood so he can support his children's future education.

loans.use: to buy ice cream cones, sugar, milk and spare parts for the motorcycle.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La señora Manuela es casada y vive en su casa propia.
Ella se dedica a confeccionar prendas desde hace mas de 20 años, ya ha ganado mucha experiencia y reconocimiento en su trabajo gracias a la dedicación y buen trato que ofrece.
El crédito sería utilizado para comprar los materiales de trabajo como telas, hilos, gomas, accesorios, entre otros. Gracias a este rubro la señora ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a sus familiares a cubrir sus gastos.
texts.en: Manuela is married and lives in her own house.  She has been sewing clothes for more than 20 years and has gained much experience and recognition in her work thanks to her dedication and to the good service she provides.  She will use the loan to buy supplies like fabric, thread, elastic, accessories, etc. for her work.  Thanks to this line of work, she’s been able to get ahead and help her family members cover expenses.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para poder continuar realizando su trabajo en venta de pupusas, se comprará materiales como el maíz, leña, gas, chicharrón, repollo, quesillo, y los demás materiales que intervienen en la producción de la venta, con este préstamo lograra continuar realizando un buen servicio a los clientes.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener a la mano los materiales para la elaboración de la venta, éste le ha permitido cambiar sus circunstancias familiares y poder vivir en una mejor condición, recibiendo mejores ingresos del negocio.
texts.en:
Ana decided to request a new loan in order to keep working in the sale of pupusas. She will buy goods such as corn, wood, gas, cracklings, cabbage, cheese and other goods needed for the production of the sale.

With this loan, she will keep offering a good service to customers. The effect of the previous loan was to allow her to grow and acquire the materials she needed to make the sale. This allowed her to change her family circumstances and be able to live in better conditions, receiving more income from her business.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, gas, cracklings, cabbage, cheese

loans.name: Victoria Del Rosario

texts.es: Victoria del Rosario de 32 años, casada, con 2 hijos de 11 y 8 años los dos está en clases. La señora victoria tiene una  pulpería, la cual consiste en un pequeña tienda donde se vende productos en pequeñas cantidades por ejemplo cigarros por unidad, azúcar y arroz por libra, aceite por cuatro de litros. Su pulpería está ubicada en su casa de habitación donde vende a los vecinos productos de consumo diario como: carne, pollo, embutidos, granos básicos, jugos, cosméticos,  ropa  y otro al contado y crédito, el financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en mercadería y de igual forma podría mejorar sus ingresos económicos, y mejorar su nivel de vida y darle mayores oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Victoria del Rosario, 32, is married with two children who are 11 and 8 years old, both in school. Ms. Victoria has a grocery store consisting of a small shop where she sells products in small quantities; for example, cigarettes sold individually, sugar and rice by the pound, and oil in four liter quantities. Her grocery store is located in her own living quarters where she sells to her neighbors such daily staples as meat, chicken, sausage, grains and legumes, juices, cosmetics, clothing and other items for cash and credit.

She wants the loan to invest in merchandise and in such manner to improve her financial income, improve her quality of life and give her children greater opportunities.

loans.use: to stock her business and purchase meat, chicken, sausage, grains and legumes, juices, cosmetics, clothing and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, and flour in bulk for her son's grocery store

loans.name: Galo Evaristo

texts.es:
Galo tiene 43 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Galo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea y poder arrendar más terreno para sembrar. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos agrícolas para que la siembra sea un exito. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas coma la langosta.

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Galo, 43, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía that belongs to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved with short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Galo grows corn.  His purchases and his sales take place in Ventanas.  He’s asking for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and urea and to be able to lease more land to plant on.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy necessary farm supplies so that his crops will be successful.  Challenges he faces are plant infestations.  His dream is to be able to buy land.  He enjoys playing volleyball in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea and to lease farmland.

loans.name: Carlos Raul

texts.es:
Carlos  tiene 37 años de edad  es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la  es posa y con los hijos en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea y poder arrendar más terreno para sembrar. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos agrícolas para que la siembra sea un exito. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas coma la langosta.

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Carlos, 37, is married and has two children.   He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved with short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Carlos grows corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He requests the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and urea and to lease more farmland.  The challenge he faces is plant infestations.  His dream is to be able to buy land.  He likes playing volleyball in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea and to lease farmland.

loans.name: Orly Geovanny

texts.es:
ORLY GEOVANNY tiene 30 años de estado civil Union Libre vive con la compañera y con los hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La Ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

ORLY GEOVANNY se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, fréjol, ademas se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, pollos. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para comprar lo necesario para la siembras. El sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.

En elt iempo libre le gusta parcticar los deportes.
texts.en:
Orly Geovanny, 30, is in a civil union and lives with his spouse and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “14 de Diciembre” communal bank that has 15 members from Cooperative San José.  It’s located in Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas belonging to Ventanas Canton.  They are in agricultural activities like planting corn.

Orly Geovanny grows corn and broad beans and also raises pigs and chickens.  He buys and sells products in Ventanas.  He requested the loan to buy manure, urea, and liquid fertilizer for his corn crops.  The loan will help him buy what he needs for the crops.  His dream is to buy a lot to continue planting.  He likes to play sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Genisa

texts.en:
Genisa of Trinidad, Bohol has had a farming business since 2009. She is 29 years old, married, and has three children ages 2, 8 and 11. Genisa and her husband rely on rice farming both for income and consumption.

Genisa is requesting a loan to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and farm labor. Her income will go into savings for future needs including school fees and maintaining the healthy diet of her children. In the future, she hopes to expand the land that she can till and increase the variety of crops grown to produce a better profit.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and labor.

loans.name: Renante

texts.en: Renante is 30 years old and from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. He is married with four children ages 3, 5, 7 and 8. Renante operates a sari-sari store and farms rice. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, seedlings and hired labor. The loan means a lot to Renante since he does not have access to bank loans. He is optimistic that everything will pay off through a good harvest. In the future, he would like to have more farmland to cultivate for a better income. This way, he can better provide for his family's needs, especially for his young children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seedlings and hired labor.

loans.name: Milton David

texts.es:
Milton  tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Milton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, líquidos , urea, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos sin ningún tipo de problema porque contara con el dinero del crédito.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas de la alangosta en los cultivos.

el sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta paracticar el deporte.
texts.en:
Milton, 28, is married and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía that’s part of Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved in agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Milton grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He requests the loan to buy fertilizer, supplies, liquids, urea and manure.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy manure problem-free because he’ll have the money from the loan.

The challenge he faces is plant infestations in his crops.  His dream is to buy a house and he enjoys playing sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, liquid nutrients, urea, and compost.

loans.name: Luis Humberto

texts.es:
Luis Humberto tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para los sembríos de maíz.Con la ayuda del crédito podra mejorar el estilo de vida y mejorar los ingresos.

Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas. El sueño es poder tener una finca. En el tiempo libre le guta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Luis Humberto, 21, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank carries out agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Luis grows corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  He’s asking for the loan to buy supplies, fertilizer, urea and liquids for his corn crops.  With help from the loan he will be able to improve his lifestyle and his income.  He faces challenges like plant infestations and his dream is to own a farm.  He enjoys playing volleyball in his free time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizers, urea, and liquids for his corn fields

loans.name: Victor Santiago

texts.es:
VICTOR SANTIAGO tiene 64 años de estado civil Soltero vive tiene 4 hijos pero no viven con el. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

VICTOR SANTIAGO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, plátano, cacao, arroz,fréjol. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar y en las ferias de los alrededores.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia. El sueño es comprar un terreno para construir una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver la television.
texts.en:
Victor Santiago is 64 years old and single. He has four children, but they don't live with him. He lives in Ventanas canton in De los Ríos province. 

The "14 of December" communal bank is made up of 15 members of Cooperativa San José, and is located in the San Vicente area of Las Lomas, in Ventanas canton. The members engage in farming, such as growing corn. 

Victor Santiago is a farmer and grows corn, plantains, cacao, rice and beans. He buys his products in Ventanas, and sells his produce in the market of the same place and in markets in the surrounding area. 

He applied for the loan to buy seeds, manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers for growing corn. The loan has helped him increase the family's income. His dream is to buy a piece of land for building a home. 

In his free time, he likes to watch television.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers for growing corn.

loans.name: Bonifacio

texts.en: Bonifacio is a 60-year-old fisherman from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. He supports his two children, ages 14 and 18. Bonifacio is asking for a loan to buy a fish net, gasoline, fish hooks and new clothes. Bonifacio hopes that his fishing business will thrive because this is the only livelihood that he knows well. His income will go towards his family's daily expenses and school fees.

loans.use: to buy a fish net, gasoline, fish hooks and new clothes.

loans.name: Gorgonia

texts.en: Gorgonia is from the community of Bien Unido in the province of Bohol. She is 57 years old and has been a rice farmer for 26 years. She has three children, ages 14, 22 and 24. Gorgoni is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide and pesticides that she can use on her farm. She would like to maintain and improve her farm, because this brings profit and food for her family. With this loan, she expects a good harvest and an increase in her business' profitability. The additional income will go towards her family's daily expenses and possible new business opportunities.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide and pesticide.

loans.name: Roque

texts.en:
Roque is 32 years old from the town of San Miguel in Bohol. He is married with two children, ages six and eight. He provides transportation services with his motorcycle, locally known as a habal-habal. He is asking for a loan to buy spare tires and pay for the vulcanizing fee of his motorcyle.

He is a tenacious man and hopes to someday improve the life of his family through his hard work. His income will go towards his family's daily expenses and school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy spare tires and pay for vulcanizing fee.

loans.name: Reynalda

texts.en:
From the town of San Miguel in Bohol, 35-year-old Reynalda started her farming business when she got married. She grows rice both for consumption and profit, her income providing for the needs of her five children, who range in age from 13 to 4 years old.

With this loan, Reynalda plans to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticides and seedlings. The additional income will go toward her family's daily consumption, school fees and reinvestment in her farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticides and seedlings.

loans.name: Candelario

texts.es:
Don Candelario originario de la comunidad Potrerillo, es una comunidad en las afueras de Teustepe, casado, tiene 5 hijos ellos estudian su secundaria en un instituto de la localidad. El se dedica a la siembra de maíz,  frijol y trigo desde los 18 años lo cual hacía con poco dinero, como segundo ingreso compraba y vendía cerdos y también era jornalero, con el tiempo obtuvo un crédito en una microfinanciera, lo utilizo para comprar toros de engorde, le fue le muy bien. Hoy en día tiene ganado de además de seguir dedicándose ala siembra de maíz, trigo y frijol que lo lleva a comercializar al mercado de la localidad donde también vende su ganado, la leche y cuajadas que le producen sus vacas.
Él dice que le gustaría vender el ganado de repasto en uno de los mercados de la capital ya que se lo pagarían bien, este año desea aumentar el área de siembra para lograr  más cosecha. Él está solicitando un crédito Kiva para comprar dos toros para engordarlos y venderlos en un  mejor precio.
texts.en:
Don Candelario is from the community of Potrerillo, which is on the outskirts of Teustepe.  He is married and has five children who are all studying at a local high school.

He has grown corn, beans and wheat since he was 18 years old, and has not made much income in this activity.  As a second source of income he began buying and selling pigs, and he also use to be a day laborer.  Eventually he obtained a loan through a microfinance insitution, which he used for the purchase of calves for fattening, and this went very well.

Currently he has livestock and also continues to grow his corn, beans and wheat.  He takes these crops to the local market to sell them, along with his livestock and the milk and curd that his cows produce.

He says that he would like to sell his dairy cows in one of the markets in the capital, since he would be able to get a good price.  This year he wants to expand his planting area so that he can get a larger harvest.  He is seeking this Kiva loan in order to but two calves so that he can fatten them and sell them at a good price.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: Victor Julio

texts.es:
VICTOR  tiene 24 años de edad de  casado tine un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 4 años de edad en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Victor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas como la langosta y el raton.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, abonos, líquidos para la maleza. con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar el nivel de vida para poder trabajar.

El sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Víctor, 24, is married and has a son.  He lives with his wife and four-year-old son in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía that’s part of Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is involved in agricultural activities related to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.

Víctor works farming corn.  His purchases and sales take place in Ventanas.  Challenges he faces are plant infestations.  He’s asking for a loan to buy supplies, urea, manure and liquid to kill weeds.  With help from the loan he’ll be able to improve his standard of living to be able to work.

His dream is to be able to buy a house and he enjoys playing sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, urea, compost, and liquid treatments for weeds.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: Ernestina de 52 años de edad, es viuda con tres hijos de 24 ,22,16 años tiene una  pulpería, la cual consiste en un pequeña tienda donde se venden productos en pequeñas cantidades por ejemplo cigarros por unidad, azúcar y arroz por libra, shampoo en bolsitas . Su pulpería está ubicada en su casa de habitación donde vende a los vecinos productos de consumo diario como: golosinas, granos básicos. El negocio lo inicio siete años atrás a raíz que su difunto esposo se enfermo de gravedad. Lo inicio con fondos propios con el objetivo de mejorar los ingresos del hogar  y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos médicos. El financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en el negocio para mejorar su capital de trabajo y ampliar el negocio  y de igual forma podría mejorar sus ingresos económicos, y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Ernestina, 52, is a widow with three children whose ages are 24, 22 and 16 years.  She has a grocery store which is a small store that sells in small quantities.  For example, cigarettes by the unit, rice and sugar by the pound, shampoo in little bags.  Her grocery store is located in her house and she sells daily consumption goods like snacks and basic grains to her neighbors.  

She started the business seven years ago when her late husband became gravely ill.  She started it with her own funds aiming at improving household income and help with her husband’s medical expenses.  She wants the loan to invest in her business to improve her working capital and expand the business to improve her income and her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Angelica Isabel

texts.es:
Angelica Isabel tiene 32 años de estado civil casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos.

La ventanilla 14 DE DICIEMBRE esta conformado por 15 socios de la cooperativa San José, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente de las Lomas, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas como la siembra de maíz.

Angelica Isabel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de  maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes. El préstamo le ayudará para comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. enfrentan desafios como las plgas el cogollero, langosta. El sueño es comprar terrenos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte y ver la television.
